entry.title: Proposed BIP status changes
entry.summary: In an email conversation on October 15, 2014, Wladimir suggested that several BIPs should go to the Final state since they have been implemented and fixed in place. These BIPs include BIP 14, BIP 21, BIP 22, BIP 31, BIP 34, BIP 35, and BIP 37. Luke responded to the email, questioning why they are not doing it in a GitHub PR instead of spamming up the ML.
